summary: A law student witnesses deception, homicide, and crime after being elected as General Secretary of his college.
cast: Kay Kay Menon|Raj Singh Chaudhary|Jesse Randhawa|Deepak Dobriyal|Ayesha Mohan|Mahie Gill|Piyush Mishra|Abhimanyu Singh|Aditya Srivastav|Mukesh Bhatt|Pankaj Jha|Savi Sidhu|Vasan Bala|Singh Bhupesh|Jyoti Dogra|Chittaranjan Giri|Neel Guha|Murari Kumar|Sanjay Kumar|Teddy Maurya|Seema Rahmani|Sanjeev|Jay Sidhu|Bharat Singh|Ranvir Singh|Anurag Kashyap
title: Gulaal
